SEARCH
Package com.zpo.studentsystem.service

Class CourseService

java.lang.Object
com.zpo.studentsystem.service.CourseService
@Service public class CourseService extends Object
Service class for the Course entity. Contains methods for adding, deleting and getting courses.

    • addCourse

      public Course addCourse(String name)
      Method for adding a course.
      Parameters:
      name - Name of the course.
      Returns:

    • deleteCourse

      public Boolean deleteCourse(Long id)
      Method for deleting a course.
      Parameters:
      id - Id of the course to be deleted.
      Returns:
      True if the course was deleted, false if the course was not found.
      Throws:
      jakarta.persistence.EntityNotFoundException - If the course with the given id was not found.

    • getCourse

      public Course getCourse(Long courseId)
      Method for getting a course by its id.
      Parameters:
      courseId - Id of the course.
      Returns:
      The course with the given id.
      Throws:
      jakarta.persistence.EntityNotFoundException - If the course with the given id was not found.

    • getAverageGrade

      public HashMap<Course,Double> getAverageGrade()
      Method for getting an average grade for each course.
      Returns:
      A map with courses as keys and their average grades as values.
